EmailTemplate.name: WBN-202210-HP-TAR-SWBR-MHPA-Webinar.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Virtual care can change lives for Medicaid members
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WEBINAR Engaging Medicaid members with multiple chronic conditions for effective care
Wednesday, October 19 | 2 p.m. Eastern Image Mature latin woman on device
Consumers with multiple chronic conditions face many challenges in staying healthy. Virtual care is a proven way to extend care to more people—including those who may struggle with access issues or other social determinants of health.
Join our webinar with Medicaid Health Plans of America (MHPA) on October 19 to learn how Teladoc Health is improving their experience through effective engagement to help health plan members live their healthiest lives.
Register now
During this session, attendees will learn: New research related to chronic condition management, including mental health for Medicaid members Insights into effective member engagement strategies Examples of improved health outcomes for some of the most vulnerable
Presenters
Glen Davis, MD Executive Clinical Programs Director Teladoc Health
Rebecca Einhorn Senior Director, Strategic Segment Engagement Teladoc Health
Hunter Sinclair Vice President, Solution Strategy Teladoc Health
About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
